title: Mytek Network Solutions Releases New Resource Highlighting the Effects of Downtime on Business Performance
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Mytek Network Solutions 
PHOENIX, Oct. 1, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- Mytek Network Solutions , a provider of IT consulting services for outsourced technology projects, has released its latest client resource on managed IT services. The infographic, titled " Without Managed IT Services - Backup, Disaster Recovery, and Business Continuity - Your Business Is at Risk ," highlights the findings of several industry studies on the costly effects of downtime on organizational performance. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151001/272996 
The infographic covers topics including: -- Whether an organization's in-house staff can handle all of its IT requirements -- The staggering amount of revenue lost to downtime every year -- The percentage of mission-critical services affected by downtime -- The organizational departments most often plagued by downtime -- The true cost of downtime 
"Our new infographic highlights some eye-opening findings on the devastating impact of downtime," said (insert spokesperson's name and title). "As troubling as these statistics are, many businesses are not well-equipped to minimize the risk of potential outages in their IT operations. They have not implemented strategies that can improve overall IT performance. 
"Although no IT solution can guarantee 100% availability, organizations can take steps to minimize disruptions," continued (insert spokesperson). "For example, partnering with a knowledgeable IT solutions company can help ensure continuous operations on those things businesses depend on most, such as immediate communications and ongoing access to data, applications and services." 
According to the infographic, downtime can affect a number of resources and activities within the company. Examples include data, security and compliance, customers, employees, productivity, software, hardware and more. In addition to incurring a cost associated in each of these areas, companies will also risk tarnishing their image if their operations grind to a halt. 
To download the infographic or access more information on custom software development, interested parties can visit http://mytek.net/infographic/managed-it-services/ . 
About Mytek Network Solutions Based in Phoenix, Arizona, Mytek Network Solutions provides IT consulting services for outsourced technology projects. The company offers a broad range of solutions in IT Network Services, IT Account Services, Data and Development Services and Telephony Services. Using a customized approach to each business scenario, Mytek designs the best solutions to fit each situation. The company specializes in network support, enterprise technology services, help desk, Microsoft and IBM application development and support, private cloud hosting, and network engineering and design. In addition to a recent Inc. 500 "Fastest Growing Private U.S. Company" award, Mytek has been chosen the "No. 1 Network Integrator" for the second year in a row by Ranking Arizona magazine. For more information, visit www.mytek.net .
